articles.title: Shah Rukh Khan celebrates as son Aryan Khan’s brand D’Yavol X, with jackets worth Rs 99,000, sells out within a day - The Indian Express
articles.description: Shah Rukh Khan took to social media as he celebrated the brand's second collection getting sold out within 24 hours. Aryan Khan launched D'Yavol X in April 2023.
articles.content: Shah Rukh Khan exuded a proud father vibe when he proudly flaunted his son Aryan Khan’s brand D’Yavol X at an airport recently. SRK was seen delighted spotting the brand at the duty free store zone a… [+1582 chars]
